body:
When i joined Senex 3 I went to get iron and when i was finished I was going to get water when I encountered this.


weird huh?
So I build a bridge just to make sure it was a glitch (I guess)

any thoughts how this happened?

title: Map Glitch?

replies.body: Something tells me the maker of the map... DUN DUN DUN.... didn't use a void world O.o
replies.body_tagged: Something tells me the maker of the map... DUN DUN DUN.... didn't use a void world O.o

replies.body: No, I was just on another map and showed the same problem. :/

replies.body: a ton of maps in repo actually aren't void, idk why because even maps like senex 3 that were BUILT in void, it gens world chunks.
